content:
Answers must be short and succinct

You have access to the following tools:
1. pokeapi_get_pokemon
   Description: Fetch a summarized view of a Pokémon by name or ID from PokeAPI. Returns id, name, height, weight, types, and sprite URLs.
   Parameters: ToolSchema(properties={"name":"string"}, required=[name])
2. pokeapi_get_move
   Description: Fetch basic information about a Pokémon move by name or ID from PokeAPI. Returns id, name, power, PP, accuracy, type, and damage class.
   Parameters: ToolSchema(properties={"idOrName":"string"}, required=[idOrName])
3. pokeapi_search_pokemon
   Description: List Pokémon names using the paginated list endpoint from PokeAPI. Supports limit (1-100, default 20) and offset (default 0) parameters.
   Parameters: ToolSchema(properties={"limit":"integer","offset":"integer"}, required=null)
4. reminder.create
   Description: Create a new reminder/event. Stores the reminder and creates a queued event for delivery.
   Parameters: ToolSchema(properties={"title":"string","description":"string","triggerAt":"string","timezone":"string","metadata":"string"}, required=[title, triggerAt])
5. reminder.list
   Description: List reminders with optional filters (status, time range, limit).
   Parameters: ToolSchema(properties={"status":"string","from":"string","to":"string","limit":"integer"}, required=null)
6. reminder.cancel
   Description: Cancel a reminder by ID. Marks the reminder as CANCELLED and prevents queued events from being delivered.
   Parameters: ToolSchema(properties={"id":"string"}, required=[id])
7. reminder.claimDue
   Description: Atomically claim due reminder events. Returns events that are due and haven't been sent yet. Use this to poll for due events without calling the LLM. Only call the LLM when events are returned.
   Parameters: ToolSchema(properties={"now":"string","limit":"integer","claimerId":"string"}, required=[claimerId])
8. reminder.ackSent
   Description: Acknowledge that reminder events were successfully sent. Call this after the LLM has processed the events.
   Parameters: ToolSchema(properties={"claimToken":"string","eventIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"sentAt":"string"}, required=[claimToken, eventIds])
9. reminder.fail
   Description: Mark reminder events as failed. Increments attempt count and stores error message. After 3 attempts, the claim is released so the event can be reclaimed.
   Parameters: ToolSchema(properties={"claimToken":"string","eventIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"error":"string"}, required=[claimToken, eventIds, error])

To use a tool, respond with a JSON object in this format:
{"tool": "tool_name", "arguments": {"param1": "value1", "param2": "value2"}}

You can request multiple tools by using an array:
[{"tool": "tool1", "arguments": {...}}, {"tool": "tool2", "arguments": {...}}]

After tool execution, you will receive the results and should provide your final answer.

Вы хотите отменить все напоминания — подтверждаю как понимаю запрос; укажите, в каком приложении или сервисе отменить все напоминания (например: iPhone «Напоминания», Google Ассистент/Google Keep, Outlook, Яндекс.Алиса/«Дом с Алисой», Samsung Reminder и т.д.). 

Если хотите общую инструкцию для популярных сервисов — скажите, какие именно, и я пришлю шаги для удаления всех напоминаний в них.
